name: oxalis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant that has heart-shaped leaves and pale flowers and sometimes grows in gardens as a weed (= a plant that is not wanted): We saw a lot of oxalis when we visited Crete. I spent all afternoon pulling out oxalis from the flower beds.
More examplesFewer examplesOxalis spreads by forming miniature bulbs below the ground.The best time to pull out oxalis is in early summer, before the bulbs become too dry.When I lived in London I had terrible trouble trying to control the pink-flowering oxalis.
